title: Speaking of Ghost
lyrics:
Remember him: torn and pale
Mama's boy keep his head
Flashing lights will soon go dark
Breathe the boards; listen to your heart
I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost

I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost





Remember him: taken away

[?]

Have a fear to hold you

Prepare the dice



Stay this way, stay this way!

Be my life!



I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost

I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost



I would love you most

When you spare the ghost

Remember I would be her ghost, sister, hey!

I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost

I would love you most

It's like speaking of a ghost

I would love you most



Summer instead; born to toil

Sister's in bed, horse in blue

Magical things await you



Grab her hand, she belongs...

She belongs to lead you

And two-by-two, horse in blue

Magical things await you...
